name: Ext_R5_ServiceRequest_location
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ServiceRequest.location for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.location from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: The preferred location(s) where the procedure should actually happen in coded or free text form. E.g. at home or nursing day care center.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.locationCode` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.locationCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.locationReference` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.locationReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.locationCode` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.locationCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.locationReference` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.locationReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.locationCode` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.locationCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.locationReference` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.locationReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
